categories: Category:Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic voice actors
Category:Star Wars: The Old Republic voice actors

nodes.text: Simon Templeman (born around 1954) is an English voice actor who is known for his role as Teryn Loghain Mac Tir in Bioware's Dragon Age. He also provided additional voices in Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic.

He is the husband of Rosalind Chao who played Keiko O'Brien on two different Star Trek series (most notably Deep Space Nine). He even played John Bates on Star Trek: The Next Generation in the episode "The Defector".
